summary: A group of cosmopolitan women passengers aboard the Trans-Siberian/Mongolian Railway are taken prisoner by Ulan Iga, a warrior princess.
cast: Badema|Lydia Billiet|Christoph Eichhorn|Sevimbike Elibay|Amadeus Flössner|Irm Hermann|Xu Re Huar|Jacinta|Peter Kern|Else Nabu|Mark Reeder|Inés Sastre|Gillian Scalici|Delphine Seyrig|Nugzar Sharia|Marek Szmielkin
keywords: reference to joan of arc|cosmopolitan|princess|passenger|f rated
title: Johanna D'Arc of Mongolia
